short_summary: a turnkey laboratory scale hyperspectral SWIR imaging system including options and delivery located in Saint-Hyacinthe, QuAnconciliation:
description: A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who bid on the previous solicitation. All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, is issuing this request for proposal for the acquisition one turnkey laboratory scale hyperspectral SWIR imaging system including options and delivery located in Saint-Hyacinthe, Qu Backlinks:
